question:
You want to sell your television. You think a friend of yours might like to buy it from you.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter, explain -why you are selling the television
describe the televisionsuggest a date when your friend can come and see it
text: I hope you are in pink of your health.It's been a long since we have had the time to catch up and reminisce about things.let's meet anytime soon if possible.Anyways,I am writing this missive to bring to your notice that I am selling my 32 inches Samsung LED that is still in guarantee and all its parts are in working condition.

I am migrating to Australia and for that reason,I want to sell each and every product that has no use to me now.Furthermore,I am facing a financial crisis due to which I require funds to arrange my tickets and to bear other household expenses.

I have ordered this LED from  Amazon and it cost me around Rs 40,000.It's a 6-month-old device with the Samsung original woofers attached to it as well as it has a sleek body that makes the visuals more vivid.Moreover,a touch feature is available on the television.

I am available this weekend as my flight is next Saturday.So,I am planning to visit Chandigarh for shopping purposes.Therefore,if you want to purchase the product then please make a visit after 10:00am on Saturday or Sunday at your convenience.
I look forward to seeing you.
